comments_since_last_sample.body: Bruh they r literally living next to a volcano screw that I would of move out that area

Yeah after learning about Pompeii I think humans should know what is a dangerous place to live or a really stupid place to live, I'll love to visit a volcano but not ignore a lesson our ancestors taught us 🤷🌋 I mean human flesh against molten hot lava and lungs with ash yeah I don't think so.  she might have a mask on but that's 1 person out of all the people that live there, not everyone is smart considering they live by a freaking volcano 😳 yeah I bet some residence that live there their whole life say they don't wear masks.
0:03  Sure would like to know the name. You OVER-annunciate and make it hard to understand. BTW, I do speak Spanish. 😉
I wish there is a volcano theme park t9 visit.
The volcano has been there longer than those people have been there.. its not the volcanos fault that they chose to move next to it.
We've damaged the earth enough and made it to the second phase
Looks like a Goron rolling down death mountain.
Why don't the get a mask to stay healthy, remember me
Lmao I love this channel honestly
Volcanologist sounds like a star trek term lol 😂
That's scary. I was expecting it would exploded like a bomb
